entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
Thanks Richard for reviewing this document.

    We will work on your comments and get back to you with an updated document shortly.

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
• File gfd-r-nsi-policy-v10.doc added

Hi All,

Thanks Richard for your detailed feedback on the NSI policy recommendation.

The NSI working group have been through these comments and I have uploaded the edited version.

I believe this is now ready to go to public comment.

Thanks!
Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
The NSI group has had an internal review of the policy document and made some updates and clarifications. I have attached the updated document as version 11.

    This version is ready to go to public comment.

    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to initial review

Dear Guy,

Thanks for this updated document. We will get confirmation from the Steering Council that it's ready for 60-day public comment.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
• File gfd-r-nsi-policy-v11_RHJ.doc added
  • Status changed from initial review to author action

The document was re-structured and much improved.
Some small corrections / clarifications suggested, then it will be ready for public comment.

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
• File gfd-r-nsi-policy-v12.doc added

Richard,

Thanks for taking the time to carefully check the document and suggest all of these helpful changes. This is much appreciated.

I have made all the changes requested, please find these in v12 of the document.

I hope this is now ready to go to public comment.

Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
• File gfd-r-nsi-policy-public-comment-v1.doc added

Richard,

The ambiguous requirement has been re-written and all of the track changes and comments have now been removed.

Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
Richard,

    John MacAuley would like to discuss this document in the upcoming NSI meeting at GLIF. For this reason, could you please hold off sending this out for public comment until after GLIF in on 1st October?

    Thanks,
    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
Dear Guy,

    Reminder that we await your input on whether/when this document is ready for public comment. If there are substantial changes, or you need additional guidance, please work with your area director. Thanks,
    Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
Hi Greg,

    Thanks for this reminder. We are still working on this document as we are making some tweaks to the NSI Policy.

    I will upload a new version as soon as it is available.

    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
• File gfd-r-nsi-policy-public-comment-v3.doc added

Hi Greg,

Please find attached a finalized version of the NSI policy document.

You will recall that last year Richard HJ reviewed the NSI policy document and a round of edits were made. Then over the past few months we have reviewed the NSI policy approach and made some refinements. This is now all reflected in the latest version of the document.

Could you please check and up load for pubic review?

Thanks,
Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Richard Hughes-Jones to Andre Merzky

We will put this into 60-day public comment, and announce to the community. At that time, please assist in getting input/comments from your constituents. Thanks,
Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
Greg,

    I notice that this document and other recently added NSI documents have not been uploaded onto the OGF document site.

    so I get 'document not found' here: https://www.ogf.org/ogf/lib/exe/fetch.php/documents/gfd.233.pdf

    Could you please take a look at this?

    Thanks,
    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #294: NSI Policy
entry.content:
Sorry for the delay with these, Guy. Indeed, the links are there, but the content is not. This has been awaiting action by the person with access to the back end... I just sent another reminder.
    - Greg
